Source.Name: clamtk
Source.Description: ClamTk is a graphical frontend for Clam Antivirus. It is designed to be a lightweight, easy-to-use, point-and-click virus scanner.

Update.Comment: Version bump: - Minor fixes to quarantine restoration, - Added an extra check to ensure files reviewed in quarantine are regular files (and not directories), - Added option to scan or ignore files under ~/.gvfs and ~/smb4k. By default, the option is ignore. We'll expand this as needed. The idea is to allow or disallow scanning of smb-mounted drives, - Scanning speed has been optimized by filtering unwanted directories and files prior to collection phase. Thanks to Dan for reporting this. (Launchpad #697614), - Updated translations.
